custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DDMDataProviderInstance.dataProviderInstanceId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DDMDataProviderInstance WHERE (DDMDataProviderInstance.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (lower(DDMDataProviderInstance.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMDataProviderInstance.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {DDMDataProviderInstance.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DDMDataProviderInstance.dataProviderInstanceId FROM DDMDataProviderInstance WHERE (DDMDataProviderInstance.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] ( (lower(DDMDataProviderInstance.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMDataProviderInstance.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DDMDataProviderInstance ON TEMP_TABLE.dataProviderInstanceId = DDMDataProviderInstance.dataProviderInstanceId ORDER BY DDMDataProviderInstance.dataProviderInstanceId DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DDMStructure.structureId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DDMStructure WHERE (DDMStructure.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] (DDMStructure.classNameId = ?) AND ( (lower(CAST_TEXT(DDMStructure.name)) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMStructure.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (storageType = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND (type_ = ?) [$STATUS$]

SELECT {DDMStructure.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DDMStructure.structureId FROM DDMStructure WHERE (DDMStructure.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] (DDMStructure.classNameId = ?) AND ( (lower(CAST_TEXT(DDMStructure.name)) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMStructure.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (DDMStructure.storageType = ? OR ? IS NULL) AND (DDMStructure.type_ = ?) [$STATUS$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DDMStructure ON TEMP_TABLE.structureId = DDMStructure.structureId ORDER BY DDMStructure.structureId DESC

SELECT COUNT(DDMTemplate.templateId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DDMTemplate WHERE [$GROUP_ID$] (DDMTemplate.classNameId = ?) AND ( (DDMTemplate.classPK = 0) OR (DDMTemplate.classPK IN ( SELECT DDMStructure.structureId FROM DDMStructure WHERE (DDMStructure.classNameId = ?) )) ) [$STATUS$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DDMTemplate.templateId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DDMTemplate WHERE (DDMTemplate.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] [$CLASSNAME_ID$] [$CLASS_PK$] (DDMTemplate.resourceClassNameId = ?) AND ( (lower(CAST_TEXT(DDMTemplate.name)) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.type_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.mode_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.language LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) [$STATUS$]

SELECT {DDMTemplate.*} FROM DDMTemplate WHERE [$GROUP_ID$] (classNameId = ?) AND ( (classPK = 0) OR (classPK IN ( SELECT DDMStructure.structureId FROM DDMStructure WHERE (DDMStructure.classNameId = ?) )) ) [$STATUS$] ORDER BY DDMTemplate.templateId DESC

SELECT {DDMTemplate.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DDMTemplate.templateId FROM DDMTemplate WHERE (DDMTemplate.companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] [$CLASSNAME_ID$] [$CLASS_PK$] (DDMTemplate.resourceClassNameId = ?) AND ( (lower(CAST_TEXT(DDMTemplate.name)) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.type_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.mode_ LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMTemplate.language LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) [$STATUS$] ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DDMTemplate ON TEMP_TABLE.templateId = DDMTemplate.templateId ORDER BY DDMTemplate.templateId DESC
